name: Time Cop (Nicolas-Ming, Mileths)
description:
As a time cop it is your duty to remove bad actors in the timeline, this time your target is the notorious Hitler. Stealthily make your way through the battlefield and make it to his secret bunker in the woods. If you get caught do not worry you can just go back in time.

Game made in 48 hours for the Miziziz game jam.

Credits-

Producer/Developer - Nicolas Ming

Developer - John "Ian" Thomson

Sound Designer - Miles Tibbits (He did the voices)

Artist - Zacharai El-Khatib
